titleStmt.title: Horatio G. Wright to John W. Finnell
CWG14465

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Handwritten Transcriptions of Civil War Telegrams

body.p:
Cincinnatti Ohio
Aug 30th 1862
Gen Jno. W. Finnell

Have instructed Genl Nelson to send a regiment or more if required from Lexington to Frankfort on Call of Governor, my information makes Morgan about 1200 or 1500 without Cannon, make requisitions for arms for Ky quota to Louisville. Secretary of War has received his
41
order and allowedÂ mine to stand.
